access/api.title: API
access/api.description: The private feeds can be created through the Sesamy Checkout flow but it's also possible to create private links for existing customers as a publisher.

access/configuration/configuration.title: Configuration
access/configuration/configuration.description: The Sesamy Access service can be configured in a variaty of ways depending on how the premium content is stored and if Sesamy Access is serving the public feed.

access/configuration/description-fallbac.title: Description Fallback
access/configuration/description-fallbac.description: As many podcast hosting services doesn't support the access XML tags there's a fallback to add the same information in the episode descriptions.

access/configuration/sources.title: Sources
access/configuration/sources.description: Sesamy Access can pull content from multiple sources when creating a new feed. Each source can be configured to either public or private.

access/configuration/xml-extension.title: XML Extension
access/configuration/xml-extension.description: Sesamy access uses the Access XML extention for both reading and writing RSS.

access/getting-started.title: Getting Started
access/getting-started.description: Sesamy Access makes it possible to sell single episodes, seasons and bundles of shows.

intro.title: Sesamy Documentation
intro.description: Explore our guides and examples to integrate Sesamy.

news-widget/meta-tags.title: Meta Tags
news-widget/meta-tags.description: When a new article or post is created it is added to the catalog of products either by using the meta tags of the page or the sesamy-content-data tag.

news-widget/news-widget.title: News Widgets
news-widget/news-widget.description: The news widgets are a collection of web components that are used to purchase and unlock content on 3rd party websites.

news-widget/passes.title: Passes
news-widget/passes.description: A pass is used to package a set of posts in a bundle. The typical use case is to offer a subscription for all articles on a website, but it could be used to package just a section of the content and it could be both single purchase or subscription.

news-widget/unlocking content.title: Unlocking Content
news-widget/unlocking content.description: When a user has purchased a post the unlocked content can be displayed using the sesamy-content-container compont. The content can either be embedded directly on the page or fetched from the server using a signed url.

news-widget/web-components/sesamy-conten.title: sesamy-content-container
news-widget/web-components/sesamy-conten.description: The content container component displays either the locked preview version of the content or the the actual content depending on if the user has access.

news-widget/web-components/sesamy-entitl.title: sesamy-entitlements
news-widget/web-components/sesamy-entitl.description: The purchases component displays a list of the users purchases. It could for instance be used on a user profile website

news-widget/web-components/sesamy-profil.title: sesamy-profile
news-widget/web-components/sesamy-profil.description: The profile component displays the name and email of the current user. It could for instance be used on a user profile website
